body_html: My team just open sourced a distributions library as part of the Pyro PPL. Here is our log_gamma() implementation. We plan to submit PRs soon to move this code upstream into PyTorch.
body_text: My team just open sourced a distributions library as part of the Pyro PPL. Here is our log_gamma() implementation. We plan to submit PRs soon to move this code upstream into PyTorch.
body: My team just open sourced a [distributions library](https://github.com/uber/pyro/tree/dev/pyro/distributions) as part of the [Pyro PPL](http://pyro.ai). Here is our [`log_gamma()`](https://github.com/uber/pyro/blob/dev/pyro/distributions/util.py#L8) implementation. We plan to submit PRs soon to move this code upstream into PyTorch.
